exceptions.exn: In environment a, x : R Unable to unify "Derive ?M2363 ?M2364 = ?M2365" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) / h) 0 = 0".
In environment a, x : R Unable to unify "Prop" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) / h) 0 = 0".
The LHS of Rabs_Rabsolu (Rabs (Rabs _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a, x : R Unable to unify "?M2363 = ?M2364 -> False" with "Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) * / h) 0 = 0".
In environment a, x : R Unable to unify "0" with "(Lim (fun h : R => (a - a) * / h) 0)²".

original: intros a x. unfold Derive. simpl. apply is_derive_unique. apply is_derive. unfold filterdiff. unfold scal. unfold mult. unfold Rdiv. rewrite Rabs_Rabsolu. apply Zeq_bool_neq. apply Rsqr_0_uniq. reflexivity.
